entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who's supposed to be researching magical methods of bugging. He asks Hermione how she managed to carry her voice down to the grounds.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is being questioned by Harry about how she carried her voice down to the grounds. She seems distracted and unsure of herself.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is concerned about Hermione's well-being and asks if she's all right.

relationships.description: Harry questions Hermione about how she managed to carry her voice down to the grounds.
